entry.title: Installing Cygwin & the Rsync Package
entry.summary:
How to Install Cygwin on Windows and Add the Rsync Package
If youâ€™re a Windows user and want to access Linux-like tools and packages, Cygwin is a great solution. Cygwin provides a large collection of GNU and Open Source tools, which offer a Linux-like environment on Windows. One such tool is rsync, a powerful utility for file synchronization.

entry.title: sed cheat sheet
entry.summary:
Regular expressions.
Replace the first occurrence of a string in a file, and print the result: sed 's/find/replace/' filename
Replace only on lines matching the line pattern: sed '/line_pattern/s/find/replace/'
Replace all occurrences of a string in a file, overwriting the file (i.e. in-place): sed -i 's/find/replace/g' filename
Replace all occurrenc...

entry.title: lxd cheat sheet
entry.summary:
Useful LXD commands List available containers lxc image list ubuntu: # ubuntu: is officially supported image source lxc image list images: # images: is an unsupported source lxc image alias list images: # lists user-friendly names
Launch a container This creates and starts a container. lxc launch ubuntu:14.04 CONTAINERNAME # image and container names are optional lxc launch u...
